summary: Siren II, a submarine under the command of Capt. Phillips, ventures into the deep on a mission to recover the missing Siren I. Their quest is hindered when the submarine becomes entangled in a patch of toxic seaweed.
cast: Jack Scalia|R. Lee Ermey|Ray Wise|Deborah Adair|John Toles-Bey|Ely Pouget|Emilio Linder|Tony Isbert|Álvaro Labra|Luis Lorenzo|Frank Braña|Pocholo Martínez-Bordiú|Edmund Purdom|Garrick Hagon|James Aubrey|Derrick Vopelka|Jed Downey|Salvador Sáinz
keywords: kaiju|gore|blood splatter|creature feature|woman wears a gas mask
director: Director: Juan Piquer Simón (as J.P. Simon)
title: La grieta
